renderer

Class PolygonBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderer.PolygonBlock

  • public class PolygonBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the PolygonBlock which represents the tiles in the game as visual blocks in the game. A PolygonBlock consist of three polygon which is drawn into a 3D block.

      • PolygonBlock

        public PolygonBlock(double x,
                    double y,
                    double z,
                    javafx.scene.paint.Color c)
        Constructor initialises everything needed to draw the PolygonBlock.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the PolygonBlock
        y - The y position of the PolygonBlock
        z - The z which helps draw the height of the PolygonBlock
        c - The color of the PolygonBlock
